Description: Incised inscription (fragmentary), made of marble. According to the register, with plaque.
Findspot: Excavated/Findspot: Egypt, Pinder-Wilson 1971, p.51: "almost certainly found in Egypt". (?)
Bibliographic references: Pinder-Wilson 1971 / An Inscription of Badr Al-Jamali
Akbarnia et al 2018 / The Islamic World: a History in Objects (p.107, fig.4)
